title: MainManager - Láttu Vita
subtitle: A hybrid mobile app to ease reporting issues with local authorities
authors: Hrafnkell Baldursson, Aron Freyr Heiðarsson, Halldís Una Hreiðarsdóttir, Hallgrímur Þórhallsson, Rannveig Guðmundsdóttir
description:
This was the final project for my BSc degree in Computer Science.
The project involved creating an app for MainManager that makes it easier for users to notify local authorites or other official institutions of a problem, without knowing who should be notified. The user can mark a location on a map, choose a category and send a notification on something that needs fixing. That notification is then automatically sent to the proper authority.
